<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// workgroups, maximum number of waves, and minimum occupancy. The opposite is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generally true for the minimum group size. LDS or barrier ressource</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// limitations can flip those minimums/maximums.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;MinWGSize, MaxWGSize&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a52b3955112597a3fcbe612414ec40e79">getFlatWorkGroupSizes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;MinWavesPerWG, MaxWGsPerCU, MaxWavesPerCU&#93; = PropsFromWGSize(MinWGSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;MaxWavesPerWG, MinWGsPerCU, MinWavesPerCU&#93; = PropsFromWGSize(MaxWGSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is possible that we end up with flipped minimum and maximum number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// waves per CU when the number of minimum/maximum concurrent groups on the CU</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is limited by LDS usage or barrier resources.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinWavesPerCU &gt;= MaxWavesPerCU) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(MinWavesPerCU, MaxWavesPerCU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaveSlotsPerCU = WavesPerEU &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for a potential smaller group size than the maximum which decreases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the concurrent number of waves on the CU for the same number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// concurrent workgroups on the CU.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MinWavesPerCUForWGSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(WaveSlotsPerCU, MinWGsPerCU + 1) &#42; MinWGsPerCU;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinWavesPerCU &gt; MinWavesPerCUForWGSize) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExcessSlots = MinWavesPerCU - MinWavesPerCUForWGSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExcessSlotsPerWG = ExcessSlots / MinWGsPerCU) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There may exist a smaller group size than the maximum that achieves</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the minimum number of waves per CU. This group size is the largest</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible size that requires MaxWavesPerWG - E waves where E is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximized under the following constraints.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 0 &lt;= E &lt;= ExcessSlotsPerWG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 (MaxWavesPerWG - E) &#42; WaveSize &gt;= MinWGSize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">        MinWavesPerCU -= MinWGsPerCU &#42; std::min(ExcessSlotsPerWG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                MaxWavesPerWG - MinWavesPerWG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for a potential larger group size than the minimum which increases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the concurrent number of waves on the CU for the same number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// concurrent workgroups on the CU.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LeftoverSlots = WaveSlotsPerCU - MaxWGsPerCU &#42; MinWavesPerWG;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LeftoverSlotsPerWG = LeftoverSlots / MaxWGsPerCU) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There may exist a larger group size than the minimum that achieves the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximum number of waves per CU. This group size is the smallest</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible size that requires MinWavesPerWG + L waves where L is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximized under the following constraints.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 0 &lt;= L &lt;= LeftoverSlotsPerWG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 (MinWavesPerWG + L - 1) &#42; WaveSize &lt;= MaxWGSize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      MaxWavesPerCU += MaxWGsPerCU &#42; std::min(LeftoverSlotsPerWG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              ((MaxWGSize - 1) / WaveSize) + 1 -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                  MinWavesPerWG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the minimum/maximum number of waves on any EU, assuming that all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// wavefronts are spread across all EUs as evenly as possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;std::clamp(MinWavesPerCU / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>(), 1U, WavesPerEU),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::clamp(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(MaxWavesPerCU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>()), 1U, WavesPerEU)&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a8287deeaeaf789fb915cb51962d4bfc4"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a0d3af39660fba65e1eb9f861b6e94822">AMDGPUSubtarget::getOccupancyWithWorkGroupSizes</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ab7feae1932b436c8630e247166ec42b7">getInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simachinefunctioninfo">SIMachineFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a1068b7ada5cc9c27785b06ec8a8f8782">getDefaultFlatWorkGroupSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getCallingConv());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Requested minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; Requested = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#af017d22179b9ba0f528f0e415fe480e0">AMDGPU::getIntegerPairAttribute</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;amdgpu-flat-work-group-size&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure requested minimum is less than requested maximum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Requested.first &gt; Requested.second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Requested.first &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#aeaf5c91b90bac99b00f3855b1af9069a">getMinFlatWorkGroupSize</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Requested.second &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#aabfb87750bb92c2facd6989036e987a8">getMaxFlatWorkGroupSize</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Requested;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#acfee50d65ad24afd0f00e89d67aa7c73"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#acfee50d65ad24afd0f00e89d67aa7c73">AMDGPUSubtarget::getEffectiveWavesPerEU</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; Requested,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; FlatWorkGroupSizes)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default minimum/maximum number of waves per execution unit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>(1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#ab96f321c806effcca947691e54b24784">getMaxWavesPerEU</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If minimum/maximum flat work group sizes were explicitly requested using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;amdgpu-flat-workgroup-size&quot; attribute, then set default minimum/maximum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of waves per execution unit to values implied by requested</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
